finetune_task_results.DESCRIPTION: Accuracy of the property finetuning task. Note: The test results does not represent the converged accuracy due to limited fine-tuning steps.

Matbench_mp_e_form.DESCRIPTION: Formation energy of materials, in eV/atom. 5-fold average.

Matbench_mp_gap.DESCRIPTION: Band gap of materials, in eV. 5-fold average.

Matbench_jdft2d.DESCRIPTION: 2D exfoliation energy from JARVIS-DFT dataset, in meV/atom. 5-fold average.

Matbench_phonons.DESCRIPTION: Frequency of the highest frequency optical phonon mode peak, in units of 1/cm. 5-fold average.

Matbench_dielectric.DESCRIPTION: Refractive index of materials, unitless. 5-fold average.

Matbench_log_kvrh.DESCRIPTION: Logarithm of the DFT Voigt-Reuss-Hill average bulk moduli in GPa. 5-fold average.

Matbench_log_gvrh.DESCRIPTION: Logarithm of the DFT Voigt-Reuss-Hill average shear moduli in GPa. 5-fold average.

Matbench_perovskites.DESCRIPTION: Formation energy of perovskites, in eV/unit cell. 5-fold average.

slope.DESCRIPTION: The slope of the energy drift, in eV/atom/ps.

momenta_diff.DESCRIPTION: The mean momentum difference, in amu · Å/fs.

simulation_time.DESCRIPTION: The time taken to simulate 10 ps, in seconds.

success_rate.DESCRIPTION: The success rate of the simulation over 9 test cases.
